suite.name: VC polls

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser. By default browser is _Chromium_. Test suite can also be set to use _Firefox_ as a browser.

test.name: Create Poll And Delete It

kw.name: Open Vibecatch And Log In
kw.doc: Opens new page to VibeCatch website and logs in.

kw.name: Open Vibecatch And Log In
kw.doc: Opens new page to VibeCatch website and logs in.

kw.name: Create Poll With Empty Namefield
kw.doc: Tries to create new QWL poll with empty namefield.

kw.name: Creating Poll Should Fail
kw.doc: Waits for 3 seconds before verifying creating poll has failed.

test.name: Create Poll And Schedule Sending

kw.name: Open Vibecatch And Log In
kw.doc: Opens new page to VibeCatch website and logs in.

test.doc: Schedules sending created poll to teantestaus@gmail.com. Settings: Streamlined, email daily 12PM.

kw.name: Open Vibecatch And Log In
kw.doc: Opens new page to VibeCatch website and logs in.

kw.name: Poll Should Exist
kw.doc: Verifies poll can be found in poll listing.

kw.name: View Results Or Send Reminder
kw.doc: Checks whether the _Wiew results_ button in poll listing is active, if not, tries to send a request to answer immediately. If there is no email added to the poll, raises an error with the message "Add an email address!".
kw.msg: Checking if results were received for the poll test1
Checking the results of the poll test1

suite.doc: This test suite tests creating polls in VibeCatch website with different settings and viewing results or sending a reminder.
